attributes.action: Call a general election. No sitting MP as of 1 April 2019 allowed re-selection.
attributes.additional_details:
The government deal is not the best deal for the UK and parliament appears unable to grasp any alternative.
None of the current incumbents are worthy of being in the House of Commons.
attributes.background: The brexit debate has proved how out of touch the current parliament is with the reality of the everyday life of most people in the UK.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You might like to sign and share these petitions instead. 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249457

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
